    About me

    I'm Elvis Tony,

    ....often come across as a silent, unnoticed being. It kinda takes time in breaking the shell. But I've heard, I can be a keeper (If you manage to Break the Ice)! This blog is about everything I can think of, it includes my hobbies, thoughts, guides, and so much more!
